option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<TextView android:text="Product List" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingBottom="10dp"/>
<ListView android:id="@+id/listViewProducts" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:dividerHeight="1dp"/> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<TextView android:text="Product List" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingBottom="10dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/branchSpinner" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<ListView android:id="@+id/listViewProducts" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:dividerHeight="1dp"/> </LinearLayout>
